mapper.select: SELECT fix.stu_id, fix.stu_name, fix.subject_id, fix.subject_name, fix.fixed_week, fix.fixed_hour, fix.fixed_minute, fix.del_flg, COALESCE(vDoc.minutes_per_lsn, 45) AS class_duration FROM v_info_fixedlesson fix LEFT JOIN v_latest_subject_info_from_student_document vDoc ON fix.stu_id = vDoc.stu_id AND fix.subject_id = vDoc.subject_id ORDER BY fix.fixed_hour, fix.fixed_minute

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_info_fixedlesson (stu_id, subject_id, fixed_week, fixed_hour, fixed_minute) VALUES (#{stuId}, #{subjectId}, #{fixedWeek}, #{fixedHour}, #{fixedMinute})
mapper.select:
SELECT fix.stu_id, fix.stu_name, fix.subject_id, fix.subject_name, fix.fixed_week, fix.fixed_hour, fix.fixed_minute, COALESCE(vDoc.minutes_per_lsn, 45) AS class_duration FROM v_info_fixedlesson fix LEFT JOIN v_latest_subject_info_from_student_document vDoc ON fix.stu_id = vDoc.stu_id AND fix.subject_id = vDoc.subject_id WHERE fix.fixed_week = #{fixedWeek}
AND NOT (fix.stu_id = #{excludeStuId} AND fix.subject_id = #{excludeSubjectId})
AND (
(#{fixedHour} * 60 + #{fixedMinute}) < (fix.fixed_hour * 60 + fix.fixed_minute + COALESCE(vDoc.minutes_per_lsn, 45)) AND
(#{fixedHour} * 60 + #{fixedMinute} + #{classDuration}) > (fix.fixed_hour * 60 + fix.fixed_minute) ) ORDER BY fix.fixed_hour, fix.fixed_minute
